thread.section_title: GetSafe Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of GetSafe | getsafe.com
thread.title: J. Anderson

author: J. Anderson
title: J. Anderson
text:
I just purchased GetSafe. I worked with Courtney Evans on the phone when I first called and she was truly the greatest. She was so patient with me while I was dealing with multiple calls after my home was broken into last week. We were on the phone an hour. It was a stressful time, but Evans took her time explaining all the components of the system while also offering to check on me the next day. Whenever you buy any product, the first indication a company gives you about their service is with how their representatives handle the sale; Evans passed that with flying colors. Maybe I'll become a spokesperson for the company and we'll replicate out call for a commercial. Thanks Courtney.
Ms. Anderson.
